settings.description_review: Bartoli’s designs are simple and straightforward, and they’re definitely the kind of pieces everyone wants to wear right now.
All pieces are made in Los Angeles from a blend of cotton and modal—and the label already counts Emily Ratajkowski and Hailey Bieber as fans.
Filled with edgy, confident, meticulously-designed staple pieces.
This is some more fashion-forward comfort wear. The cuts are everything.
Sophisticated in their simplicity, these are items made to be worn day or night.
Éterne makes elevated essentials you'll want to live in.

settings.aboutProductDescription:
Cut from a lightweight cotton and modal blend, our cropped v-neck t-shirt features a slightly slim fit with its flattering V neckline and vintage feel.

Style with your favorite pair of jeans, leather pants, layered under an oversized blazer, or paired with Éterne’s lounge boxer short as a set.
